With this guidance, there are very strict capacity limitations and social distancing requirements that will greatly affect our ticket sales for athletic events this year and how many spectators can attend these events in person.

In order to make this work, for the 2020-2021 school year, we will not be able to honor Loyal Falcon Passes, Lifetime SOC Passes, Staff Passes, or any other type of free admission to any sporting event held in the district.‚Ä¶

Dear Minford Students, Families, Staff, and Athletes-
This week, Governor DeWine issued a travel advisory for all Ohioans to self-quarantine for 14 days upon returning from the following states and territories:

ÔÇ∑ Alabama

ÔÇ∑ Georgia
ÔÇ∑ Idaho
ÔÇ∑ Mississippi
ÔÇ∑ Nevada
ÔÇ∑ South Carolina
ÔÇ∑ Texas

If you have been to one of the states identified above, do not attend any school function or be on school property until 14 days have elapsed since you returned to Ohio.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Our top priority is to maintain the safety of our students, staff, and community.

-Minford Local Schools
